name: aegis-crypto-core
description: Aegis: Unified WebAssembly, Rust, and Python PQ cryptography core with ML-KEM, ML-DSA, Falcon, HQC-KEM, SPHINCS+ support. Complete NIST post-quantum cryptography implementation with 100+ WASM variants.

scripts.build: cd aegis_crypto_core && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --features wasm,nist-wasm
scripts.build:node: cd aegis_crypto_core && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg --features wasm,nist-wasm
scripts.build:bundler: cd aegis_crypto_core && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg --features wasm,nist-wasm

author: Justin Hutzler <justin@synergy-network.io>
